name: A Door In Every Wall
description:
Every wall can be a door if you so wish, but which ones are worth opening?

ADIEW is a sci-fi 3D puzzle game, in which you take control of a tiny robot making their way through complex mazes. Collect chips, create portals, avoid enemies, manage your battery and much more.

There are in total 6 levels, ranging from tutorial-like difficulty to harsh brain-breakers - offering up to an  hour worth of content for a first playthrough.

This game was fully developed by me, Miguel Pereira, but multiple free assets were used in the process - mainly meshes for environment decoration - which deserve their due credit. 

Protagonist Model - Ollendorf

Enemy Model - Max Christiansen

Sci-fi Machinery - Jonathan

Chip - Cityon360

Battery Capsule - EspinArt3D

Door - ClearSky5201314

Computers - Loarziel

JumpPad Platform - D3xix

Enemy Capsule - Xavi Pujadas

Audio Assets : Freesound
